scripts.test-composability-curvestand: npx hardhat test mocha ./test/composability/system.test.js --network curvestand && npx hardhat test mocha ./test/composability/spl-token.test.js --network curvestand
scripts.test-composability-neondevnet: npx hardhat test mocha ./test/composability/system.test.js --network neondevnet && npx hardhat test mocha ./test/composability/spl-token.test.js --network neondevnet
scripts.test-raydium-composability-neondevnet: npx hardhat test mocha ./test/composability/raydium-cpmm.test.js --network neondevnet && npx hardhat test mocha ./test/composability/raydiumm-cpmm-create-pool-and-lock-LP.test.js --network neondevnet
scripts.test-token-curvestand: npx hardhat test mocha ./test/token/ERC20ForSplFactory.test.js --network curvestand && npx hardhat test mocha ./test/token/ERC20ForSPL.test.js --network curvestand && npx hardhat test mocha ./test/token/ERC20ForSPLMintable.test.js --network curvestand
scripts.test-token-neondevnet: npx hardhat test mocha ./test/token/ERC20ForSplFactory.test.js --network neondevnet && npx hardhat test mocha ./test/token/ERC20ForSPL.test.js --network neondevnet && npx hardhat test mocha ./test/token/ERC20ForSPLMintable.test.js --network neondevnet
